alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 02 at 1:11AM PDT until May 03 at 12:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO MIDNIGHT PDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes and Owens Valley. * WHEN...From noon today to midnight PDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds for the Owens Valley will likely be in the Olancha and Pearsonville areas.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley
